name: SynthioLabs
long_description:
Pharma spends billions on medical and sales teams. Yet many physicians still don’t get the timely, relevant medical insight they need.

So we built an AI Medical Expert for Pharma GTM teams. Our Medical grade Voice AI Platform delivers compliant, science-first engagement to physicians and patients

It’s like adding 100 medical reps to your team, without the headcount.

Our vision? To reimagine how pharma engages its most important stakeholders — patients and HCPs

We’re ex-McKinsey, ex-ZS Life Sciences experts and AI Researchers from AWS. We have worked with 10 of the top 20 pharma companies and bring over a decade of experience in Life Sciences. 

We're synthiolabs.com. Reach out to learn more!
one_liner: Voice AI Medical Rep for Pharma
